item.description:
Tired about Chinese food? Let's try something else!!! Let's go to Algerian & Tunisian cuisine This time. Come to join us, learn more Chinese culture, and meet friends. gives everyone an opportunity to come and make new friends, practice their Chinese or English, and enjoy dinner with us. Bring your friends, and come by, relax, practice in either language of your choice, and enjoy being part of our growing community.

CASH ONLY!!!


Take the T to Central Square, www.mbta.com.

For driving directions



We look forward to seeing you there! We gonna be there from 6:30pm to 8:00pm( or later depend how many people will attend)

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Friday Night Dinner Table (Algerian/Tunisian Cuisine)
